title: Very Poor, Grainy Video Call Quality on Pixel 5: WhatsApp, Google Duo, Skype have the same issue
content:
Video call quality on Video calling Apps like WhatsApp, Google Duo & Skype is horrible on PIXEL 5. The video quality is so grainy, it is pathetic. Bright sunny environments are made black & white. These days video calling is so essential and issue with that is non-negotiable. I have seen Google support passing the buck saying check with 3rd party app developers.
Check your own Duo app for this Google.
How can this be not a priority issue and that too on your latest flagship phone.
The photos and videos from the normal Camera App are really good, take nothing away from it but on video calls you have to fix this.
Or 
Let me know how to return this phone because service providers like Optus Australia DO NOT CONSIDER THIS AS AN ISSUE, HEIGHTS.
So want to go back to my iPhone.

GRAINY VIDEO CALL QUALITY -1


GRAINY VIDEO CALL QUALITY -2


ACTUAL PIXEL CAMERA OUTSIDE VIDEO CALLS



Gautam
a not happy Pixel 5 user wanting to return this phone.
